subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Phoenix Suns and the Dallas Mavericks have coped with injuries all season. Now they are scrambling to change their lineups after losing starters in Game 1 of the Western Conference finals.
snippet: The Phoenix Suns and the Dallas Mavericks have coped with injuries all season. Now they are scrambling to change their lineups after losing starters in Game 1 of the Western Conference finals.
